name: M2M
tag_list: innovation-factory, branding, marketing-metrics, strategic-marketing, social-networks, loyalty, franchise-planning, business-planning, new-product-categories, marketing-interim, marketing-audit, emotional-marketing, bundling, brand-value, design, packagin
overview:
We boost business in order to participate in highly competitive markets, leading projects requiring high qualification people and Best Innovative Marketing practices.

M2M offers a multidisciplinary team with seniority allowing you to detect new business opportunities for new product categories, services, consumer segments or ways to experience your products.

Outstanding Experience improving your Marketing Intangibles: Brand, Atmosphere POS, Customer Experience, Loyalty, Affinity, Product and Packaging Design,..

Best approach for Marketing Tech Innovation: Internet (social networks, web analytics apps, Google Campaigns, advanced mkt on line solutions) + Mobile Solutions(oriented to low cost attractive marketing apps) + Multimedia/Digital TV.

Experience planning THINK TANKS, developing Telecommunication Products Bundling for TELCOS, managing Intellectual Property Rights Collections Agencies and impelling Business Franchises Growth: planning, interim management, business development, performance tracking..,

We have also developed Marketing & Business Planning for Regional Development Agencies in Spain and private firms about Tourism/Leisure and we have an excellent network with the Spanish Leisure and Tourism Sector.

Coachers about Marketing Firm Value Creation & Complex Sales
